thread.title: Chesapeake Charter Offers Charter Transportation for Wedding Transportation Modern Fleet of Busses and Motor Coaches
thread.title_full: Chesapeake Charter Offers Charter Transportation for Wedding Transportation Modern Fleet of Busses and Motor Coaches

author: prbuzz.com
title: Chesapeake Charter Offers Charter Transportation for Wedding Transportation Modern Fleet of Busses and Motor Coaches
text:
Chesapeake Charter is a Maryland charter transportation company that provides school bus and motor coach transportation services under the spearhead of Founder and President, John J. Lonergan, Jr. his trusted team and impressive assembly of a modern fleet of motor coaches and school buses. The transportation company also offers wedding transportation services that maintain the highest quality of service with clean and well maintained seating. The fleet of company’s modern Busses and Motor Coaches are driven by friendly and professional drivers.
Hiring a capable charter transportation company to provide transportation services for the wedding party and the guests can allow everyone attending the wedding to enjoy the evening with easy. The Chesapeake Charter wedding transportation experts suggest that when planning to arrange the transportation for a wedding, the research and finalizing a company should be completed months in advance to avoid any last minute stress. Informing the company in advance about the number of people who will be using the transportation service to and from the hotels where the guest are staying to the reception site or from the venue of the wedding ceremony to a different reception site, will allow the company to suggest the right vehicle and rate of service to match the needs of the clients.
The Chesapeake Charter Maryland wedding transportation experts suggest: “Talk to your reception site manager and determine you’re parking options. Some sites handle parking arrangements; otherwise check their preferred vendor list to hire an independent service. Depending on the approximate number of guests who will drive their own cars, you may need a luxury motorcoach or school bus to transport your guests to and from the wedding and reception. Providing transportation is a convenience that will take the pressure off you and your guests!”
Chesapeake Charter fleet of chartered transportation vehicles includes over 50 passenger motor coaches, 44 school busses and 2 mini motor coaches, that are kept well maintained and clean ready for service at all times which are driven by the company’s insured and highly skilled drivers.
About us: Chesapeake Charter was established in the year 1976 with 1 school bus providing transportation for Anne Arundel County Public Schools by John J. Lonergan, Jr. As professionals, Chesapeake has prided themselves in their goal to provide safe, reliable service at competitive rates. Chesapeake Charter, Inc. provides motor coach and school bus transportation for Baltimore, Annapolis, Ocean City, Washington DC., Alexandria VA, Arlington VA, Atlantic City, Philadelphia PA, York PA, and everything in between. Their patrons have been nothing less than satisfied with our services provided. For more information please visit: http://www.chesapeakecharter.net/
